function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation strategies leading to poor air quality","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced air quality sensors and refinement of ventilation strategies","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, occupancy information, ventilation control systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns related to non-wearable sensor systems","Impact":"Potential resistance to compliance and usage of non-wearable sensor systems","Mitigation":"Addressing privacy concerns through transparent policies and consent mechanisms","Technologies":"Privacy-enhancing technologies, clear data management policies","People":"Building occupants and data privacy advocates","Owner":"Building owners, technology providers"},{"Description":"Intrusiveness and effectiveness of wearable sensor systems","Impact":"Ineffective monitoring of occupant data and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improving wearable sensor design and promoting consistent usage","Technologies":"Advanced wearable sensor technology, user-friendly designs","People":"Building occupants and health and safety advisors","Owner":"Building owners, technology providers"}]}
